content.en: Lung segmentation: Researchers are exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to accurately segment lungs and lung regions in medical images such as CT scans and chest X-rays. These algorithms play a key role in improving automated lung segmentation and overcoming challenges faced by traditional methods. By accurately identifying lung regions, these algorithms have the potential to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of various lung conditions, including tuberculosis and COVID-19.
content.da: Lungesegmentering: Forskere undersøger brugen af deep learning-algoritmer til præcist at segmentere lunger og lungeregioner i medicinske billeder såsom CT-scanninger og røntgenbilleder af brystkassen. Disse algoritmer spiller en nøglerolle i at forbedre automatiseret lungesegmentering og overvinde udfordringerne ved traditionelle metoder. Ved nøjagtigt at identificere lungeregioner har disse algoritmer potentialet til at hjælpe med diagnose og behandling af forskellige lungelidelser, herunder tuberkulose og COVID-19.
